name: Kyle's Drywall Rampage (Devin Tyler)
description:
This is a copy of the original page. The original page can be accessed here.

Game made for the 2019 Fitchburg State Game Jam

Developers - Aaron Hogan, Devin Tyler, Evan Fridrich

Controls:

W A S D - Movement

Mouse - Look

Left/Right click - Punch

Spacebar - Jump

Shift - Sprint

Escape - Exit

R - Reset
